name: TheUnmasked
description:
Patch_3.2.1 avaible
(for save games transfer, please copy/paste the former folder:
TheUnmasked_patch\Game\TheUnmasked\saved -> all 3 folders (Config,Logs;SaveGame) into the new version)

A short story horror game with walking sim elements and survival.
Discover a story of someone who is gone long ago, or you might think so.
There is something watching.
You may survive this nightmare but what lurks at the end?

Hello, and thank you for your interest in this game!

It is part of my Master's thesis, and therefore also, a questionnaire is available. 

I would really appreciate any participation! It would help me out so much to gather data. In return, just have fun with the game!

The questionnaire can be found in the zip folder downloaded here, and it contains every instruction needed. It also comes with a bug report sheet if you find anything.

Thanks for everything, and prepare to wonder what happened and what will happen to you?

It sees you!
